languages.text: "Злачное место. Не удивлюсь, если увижу здесь пару знакомых лиц из базы розыска. А вот они — точно удивятся, да, Глейто?"
languages.translation_comment:
At the Adeptus Amasecus on Footfall.
Idira: "Nice little spot! It's good to see folks enjoying themselves. Even the air in here feels nicer to breathe!"

traits.locale_text: "Злачное место. Не удивлюсь, если увижу здесь пару знакомых лиц из базы розыска. А вот они — точно удивятся, да, Глейто?"

languages.text: "Yes, this is a real hot spot. I would not be surprised to run into some familiar faces from the wanted list. But they sure would be surprised. Right, Glaito?"
languages.translation_comment:
At the Adeptus Amasecus on Footfall.
Idira: "Nice little spot! It's good to see folks enjoying themselves. Even the air in here feels nicer to breathe!"
languages.original_text: "Злачное место. Не удивлюсь, если увижу здесь пару знакомых лиц из базы розыска. А вот они — точно удивятся, да, Глейто?"

"Yes, this is a real hot spot. I would not be surprised to run into some familiar faces from the wanted list. But they sure would be surprised. Right, Glaito?"

languages.text: 「ああ、ここは本物の『ホットスポット』だ。指名手配リストに載ってる顔ぶれと鉢合わせしても不思議ではないな。もっとも、向こうはかなり驚くだろう。なあ、グライト？」
languages.original_text: "Yes, this is a real hot spot. I would not be surprised to run into some familiar faces from the wanted list. But they sure would be surprised. Right, Glaito?"

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、ここは本物の『ホットスポット』だ。指名手配リストに載ってる顔ぶれと鉢合わせしても不思議ではないな。もっとも、向こうはかなり驚くだろう。なあ、グライト？」

languages.text: "Ja, das ist ein echter Hotspot. Es würde mich nicht wundern, hier ein paar Gesichter von der Fahndungsliste zu sehen. Die würden sich aber bestimmt wundern. Oder, Glaito?"
languages.original_text: "Yes, this is a real hot spot. I would not be surprised to run into some familiar faces from the wanted list. But they sure would be surprised. Right, Glaito?"

traits.locale_text: "Ja, das ist ein echter Hotspot. Es würde mich nicht wundern, hier ein paar Gesichter von der Fahndungsliste zu sehen. Die würden sich aber bestimmt wundern. Oder, Glaito?"

languages.text: « Oui, c'est un établissement très populaire. Je ne serais pas étonné d'y reconnaître des visages figurant sur la liste des criminels recherchés, mais eux seraient certainement surpris de me voir. N'est-ce pas, Glaito ? »
languages.original_text: "Yes, this is a real hot spot. I would not be surprised to run into some familiar faces from the wanted list. But they sure would be surprised. Right, Glaito?"

traits.locale_text: « Oui, c'est un établissement très populaire. Je ne serais pas étonné d'y reconnaître des visages figurant sur la liste des criminels recherchés, mais eux seraient certainement surpris de me voir. N'est-ce pas, Glaito ? »

languages.text: «Sí, este sitio es un hervidero de actividad. No me sorprendería toparme con algunas caras conocidas de la lista de los más buscados. Pero ellos seguro que sí se sorprenderían. ¿Verdad, Glaito?».
languages.original_text: "Yes, this is a real hot spot. I would not be surprised to run into some familiar faces from the wanted list. But they sure would be surprised. Right, Glaito?"

traits.locale_text: «Sí, este sitio es un hervidero de actividad. No me sorprendería toparme con algunas caras conocidas de la lista de los más buscados. Pero ellos seguro que sí se sorprenderían. ¿Verdad, Glaito?».

languages.text: “是啊，这地方确实不错。如果在这里碰到了通缉令上的老面孔，我一点都不会惊讶，但那些人肯定会惊掉下巴，你说呢，格雷托？”
languages.original_text: "Yes, this is a real hot spot. I would not be surprised to run into some familiar faces from the wanted list. But they sure would be surprised. Right, Glaito?"

traits.locale_text: “是啊，这地方确实不错。如果在这里碰到了通缉令上的老面孔，我一点都不会惊讶，但那些人肯定会惊掉下巴，你说呢，格雷托？”

languages.text: "Evet, burası epey bilindik bir yer. Arananlar listesinden birkaç aşina yüz görürsem şaşırmam. Fakat onlara sürpriz olabilir, değil mi Glaito?"
languages.original_text: "Yes, this is a real hot spot. I would not be surprised to run into some familiar faces from the wanted list. But they sure would be surprised. Right, Glaito?"

traits.locale_text: "Evet, burası epey ünlü. Arananlar listesinden birkaç aşina yüz görürsem şaşırmam ama onlara sürpriz olabilir. Değil mi, Glaito?"

languages.original_text: "Yes, this is a real hot spot. I would not be surprised to run into some familiar faces from the wanted list. But they sure would be surprised. Right, Glaito?"
